events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I want to request a refund because the size I received is incorrect and doesn't fit me at all.
The case has been categorized under 'Refund' based on the customer's request for money back due to wrong sizing.
This case has been assigned to agent Julia Thompson for further handling of the refund process.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m Julia, and I’ll assist you with your refund request today. Can you please provide your order number?
To process the refund smoothly, could you please send a photo of the jacket tag showing the size and your order confirmation email?
Sure! Here is the picture of the jacket tag and the order confirmation email attached. The size shows 'L' but I ordered 'M'.
Thanks for the information. We can offer you a full refund once the jacket is returned. I will email you the return shipping label shortly.
That sounds great, thank you for the quick help. I will send the jacket back as soon as I get the shipping label.
We have received your returned jacket and processed the refund to your original payment method. Please allow 3-5 business days for the amount to appear.
Just checking in to confirm you received your refund and that everything is satisfactory. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
As we have not heard back, we will now close this case. Thank you for your patience, and we hope to serve you better next time.
